room_title: Escape room "The Zodiac" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: Me and my family loved The Zodiac. We didn't make it out, but since we were so close, our clue master let us finish, and we used only an extra second.

room_title: Escape room "The Zodiac" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: We had so much fun it was an awesome way to spend a rainy Friday night! We did The Zodiac Room and the detail was amazing. The owner was awesome and so polite! We can't wait to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "The Zodiac" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: We did the zodiac killer one today and had a great time!! Cory was our Clue Master and he did a superb job!

room_title: Escape room "The Zodiac" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: Seven of my friends and I went to Get a Clue for the first time last night for my birthday. We had the absolute best time! The Zodiac room was so intricate and definitely harder than any of us expected. The two guys working last night were friendly, funny and very helpful on explaining everything we needed to know. We will for sure be returning again to do another room, and definitely recommend this place to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "The Zodiac" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: We played Zodiac tonight and had a ball. The staff was very welcoming & as a clue master, provided us with clues that kept us in the game, without giving too much away. The game was set up well and provided our group with a challenge. We can't wait to come back and try the Chocolate Factory!

room_title: Escape room "The Zodiac" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: What a great time at Get a Clue Games! Right off the bat, the staff were welcoming, engaging, and hilarious. We did the Zodiac room tonight and were very impressed with the level of details involved in the clue sequences. Without giving anything away, let's just say that the types of puzzles used in the room are very inventive and unique. It was certainly a good, challenging room that kept our hearts racing right up until the end! We are looking forward to coming back soon to take a crack at the other rooms. Great job Get a Clue Games!
